model.title: Model
model.description: The HuggingFace model to deploy. (Hint: Try (ise-uiuc/Magicoder-S-DS-6.7B)[https://huggingface.co/ise-uiuc/Magicoder-S-DS-6.7B] for a solid, general-purpose starting model.)

token.title: Access Token
token.description: The HuggingFace access token to use for installing gated models.

model_name.title: Model Name
model_name.description: Model name supplied to OpenAI client in frontend web app. Should match huggingface.model above.

model_instruction.title: Model instruction
model_instruction.description: The initial model prompt (i.e. the hidden instructions) to use when generating responses.

llm_temperature.title: LLM temperature
llm_temperature.description: The 'temperature' value to use when generating LLM responses. See [here](https://platform.openai.com/docs/api-reference/chat/create#chat-create-temperature) for details.
